abstract: Pres Obama gives speech on final day of three-day United Nations summit meeting on development goals, underscoring benefit of taking collective action to address issues like extreme poverty and deadly infections like HIV.
lead_paragraph: Calling for better treatment of women around the world as he addressed the General Assembly, President Obama said he had no patience for excuses about discrimination.

headline.main: Obama Tackles Poverty and Sexism in U.N. Speech
headline.print_headline: Obama Tackles Poverty in U.N. Speech

snippet: Calling for better treatment of women around the world as he addressed the General Assembly, President Obama said he had no patience for excuses about discrimination.
